title: Customer Analytics
description: Many firms have extensive information about customers’ choices and how they react to marketing campaigns, but few have the expertise to efficiently act on such information. In this course, students will learn a scientific approach to marketing with hands-on use of technologies such as databases, analytics, and computing systems to collect, analyze, and act on customer information. Students may not earn credit for both MGT 455 and MGT 455R. Prerequisites: restricted to MBA students or by department approval.
